abstract.para: CherryPy 2.1 includes a powerful sessions system provided via a new "sessionFilter". The old sessions system was difficult to extend and was not thread safe.

section.title: sessionFilter.on
section.para: Can be True or False. Will toggle on/off a specific named session. The setting only affects individual sessions, the sessionfilter must still be turned on using sessionFilter.on.

section.title: sessionFilter.storageType
section.para: The storagType is the string name of the storage type for sessionName. The built in storageType are: 'ram', 'file',

section.title: sessionFilter.timeout
section.para: The number of minutes of inactivity before an individual session can be removed.

section.title: sessionFilter.cleanUpDelay
section.para: The number of minutes to wait before cleaning up old sessions.
